text: On a tall hill outlined in vivid glaring green against the wintry sky stood the ice palace.
There were books and magazines piled up in the window of a stall a few paces down the street.
Big, solemn oaks grew close to it, and their thick-leaved, far-reaching branches shadowed it like a pall.
